item.title: Let's Derive - Baum-Welch for HMMs
item.description: I’ve gotten so tired of reading other people’s descriptions of Baum Welch that don’t seem to help me understand it better so I’ve decided to write my own. Hopefully, this makes it so that I never have to read anyone else’s description again. Reader Assumptions Since I’m writing this for myself, I’m going to assume a lot of knowledge. If you’ve never heard of an HMM, this post’s probably not for you.
